    • 方法详细资料

      • createPublicGroup

        public reactor.core.publisher.Mono<EMGroup> createPublicGroup(String owner,
                                                              List<String> members)
        Create a public group. By default, member of public group could not invite others to join. To allow member invite others, you can update group settings like this: 
        
      EMService service;
      service.group().updateSetting("group-id", settings -> settings.memberCanInvite(true)).block();
        参数:
        owner - the owner's username
        members - the initial members, could be null or empty to create an empty group
        返回:
        A Mono which emits EMGroup on success.

      • createPublicGroup

        public reactor.core.publisher.Mono<EMGroup> createPublicGroup(String owner,
                                                              List<String> members,
                                                              int maxMembers,
                                                              boolean needApproveToJoin)
        Create a public group. By default, member of public group could not invite others to join. To allow member invite others, you can update group settings like this: 
        
      EMService service;
      service.group().updateSetting("group-id", settings -> settings.memberCanInvite(true)).block();
        参数:
        owner - the owner's username
        members - the initial members
        maxMembers - how many members could join this group
        needApproveToJoin - whether user joining this group have to wait, until owner/admin approve it
        返回:
        A Mono which emits EMGroup on success.

      • createPrivateGroup

        public reactor.core.publisher.Mono<EMGroup> createPrivateGroup(String owner,
                                                               List<String> members)
        Create a private group.
        参数:
        owner - the owner's username
        members - the initial members
        返回:
        A Mono which emits EMGroup if successful.

      • createPrivateGroup

                                                               List<String> members,
                                                               int maxMembers,
                                                               boolean canMemberInvite)
        Create a private group.
        参数:
        owner - the owner's username
        members - the initial members
        maxMembers - how many members could join this group
        canMemberInvite - can member invite others
        返回:
        A Mono which emit EMGroup if successful.

        参数:

        返回:
        A Mono completes on success.

      • listAllGroups

        public reactor.core.publisher.Flux<EMGroup> listAllGroups()
        List all groups. Note that listAllGroups will send requests recursively until the end. You can use the listGroups api to control when to send next request.
        返回:
        A Flux which emits EMGroup on success.

      • listGroups

        public reactor.core.publisher.Mono<GroupListResponse> listGroups(int limit,
                                                                 String cursor)
        List groups in one page. At the first call, pass null in cursor. Then you need to pass the cursor returned from previous response. 
        
  EMService service;
  GroupListResponse response = service.listGroups(20, null).block();
  List<EMGroup> groups = response.getEMGroups();
  // ... do something to the groups ...
  String cursor = response.getCursor();
  while (cursor != null) {
      response = service.listGroups(20, cursor);
      // ... do something to the groups ...
      cursor = response.getCursor();
  }
        参数:
        limit - the limit, controls max members returns each time
        cursor - the cursor received in the previous response
        返回:
        A Mono emits GroupListResponse on success.

      • listGroupsUserJoined

        public reactor.core.publisher.Flux<EMGroup> listGroupsUserJoined(String username)
        List groups user joined.
        参数:
        username - the username
        返回:
        A Flux which emits EMGroup on successful.

      • getGroupDetails

        public reactor.core.publisher.Mono<EMGroupDetails> getGroupDetails(String groupId)
        Get this group detail. To get group details, 
        
      EMService service;
      EMGroupDetails details = service.group().detail("1").block();
        参数:
        groupId - the group id
        返回:
        A Mono emits EMGroupDetail on success.

      • updateSettings

        public reactor.core.publisher.Mono<Void> updateSettings(String groupId,
                                                        Consumer<GroupSettingsUpdateRequest> customizer)
        Update this group's settings. To update max members of a group: 
        
     EMService service;
     service.group().updateSettings("1", settings -> settings.maxMembers(100)).block();
        参数:
        groupId - the group id
        customizer - update request customizer
        返回:
        A Mono completes on successful.

        返回:

      • listAllGroupMembers

        public reactor.core.publisher.Flux<EMGroupMember> listAllGroupMembers(String groupId,
                                                                      int limit)
        List all members of a group. This method is recommended over getGroupDetails, since Note that listAllGroupMembers send requests recursively until the end. You call use listGroupMembers to control when to send next request.
        参数:
        groupId - the group id
        limit - the limit groups requested each time, 20 is a good start point. Tune it higher to get better I/O efficiency, smaller to get lower latency.
        返回:
        A Flux emits EMGroupMember.

      • listGroupMembers

        public reactor.core.publisher.Mono<GroupMemberListResponse> listGroupMembers(String groupId,
                                                                             int limit,
                                                                             String cursor)
        List members of a group. At the first call, pass null in cursor. Then you need to pass the cursor returned from previous response. 
        
  EMService service;
  GroupListResponse response = service.listGroupMemberss("group-id", 10, null).block();
  List<EMGroupMembers> groups = response.getEMGroups();
  // ... do something to the members ...
  String cursor = response.getCursor();
  while (cursor != null) {
      response = service.listGroupMembers("group-id", 10, cursor);
      // ... do something to the members ...
      cursor = response.getCursor();
  }
        参数:
        groupId - the group id
        limit - the limit, controls max members returns each time
        cursor - the cursor received in the previous response
        返回:
        A Mono emits GroupMemberListResponse.
